name: Hawksbill Turtle
description: Critically endangered sea turtle known for its beautiful shell.

name: Blue Tang Fish
description: Bright blue fish popularized by the movie Finding Nemo.

name: Margarita Burrowing Owl
description: Small, long-legged owl that nests in underground burrows.

name: Cactus Wren
description: Large wren species that builds nests in cacti for protection.

name: Mangrove Warbler
description: Small songbird that thrives in mangrove ecosystems.
